title: Game Crashed
body:
I was playing normal blind pick, and when minions spawned my game crashed. I didnt know what to do, so I rebooted my computer and returned to the game. After that, there was a warning saying
"LeaverBuster Warning Abandoning a match or being AFK results in an unfair game for your teammates, and is a punishable offence in Leauge of Legends. Do you agree not to leave any further games? Type "I Agree" to continue. "
Am I going to be punished? And why did my game crashed? 
I changed my settings from fullscreen to windowed, and back to fullscreen because there was a problem to play in windowed.

replies.body:
The warning just serves to let you know that a *trend of disconnections* can lead to a low-priority queue from our [**Leaverbuster System.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) Since you had issues with windowed mode, you may want to [update your display driver](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1) to prevent further issues from occurring.

Let me know if you have any questions!
